extendedInfo.description: Chief Resident Pearls is a collection of flash cards with high yield facts from Internal Medicine science. Free version includes 500 âmust-knowâ facts from fifteen medical specialties! Full version has nearly 1400 flash cards! These facts were selected based on one the following three criteria:- frequently used by internal medicine residents; these facts are typically included in resident âsurvival guidesâ; electrolyte replacement guidelines or antibiotic choice for common inpatient diagnosis belong to this category;- life savers: ACLS drug doses, life-threatening side effects of drugs, ventilator management rules;- morning-report worthy factsThe target audience for Chief Resident Pearls consists of third- and fourth-year medical students, interns, and junior internal medicine residents. Knowing these pearls eases transition into American medicine for international medical graduates. Senior healthcare professionals may consider Chief Resident Pearls as a tool to refresh their knowledge.CHIEF RESIDENT PEARLS IS A LEARNING TOOL, NOT AN INSTRUCTION FOR PATIENT CARE. The purpose of this software is to facilitate learning of important medical facts, not to advice on patient management.
